data.message: Hate this so much. Wish you would just make it the same story across FB, Messenger and IG. There is not a single person on the planet that I care to see three meaningless stories from. If you're going to copy Snapchat, at least be less annoying about it.

replies.message: Hi Kerri. This is more about a format that's become a prominent way that people want to share online. Just like Instagram brought filters that are now widely adopted, we're building stories-style formats to help people share the way they want to. -Jon

Lets be real here for a moment facebook. Old school macbook computers had filters on their camera and photobooth. Instagram didn't invent filters. Again, you are stealing other peoples ideas and have no creativity.

Facebook we only want to use those features through IG or Snapchat. That feature is not something that I want to use on Facebook. And it's ridiculous that I can't get rid of the Stories bar on top of my newsfeed. All it does is make my phone run slower than it was as it "attempts" to load.

I hate the new fb stories! I certainly don't plan to use it, because I'm not a narcisstic idiot, and I don't​ want to see others. Is there a way we can block it, like how we can block the annoying FB live?
